params.value: list of keywords separated by spaces

params.name: filter
params.value: safename eq mySafe AND ModificationTime gte 0

items.name: Get Session Management Policy of Platform
Update Session Management Policy of Platform

body.json:
{
    "username": "newUser",
    "userType": "EPVUser",
    "initialPassword": "putPasswordHere",
    "authenticationMethod": [
        "AuthTypePass"
    ],
    "location": "\\",
    "unAuthorizedInterfaces": [
        "PSM",
        "PSMP"
    ],
    "expiryDate": 1577836800,
    "vaultAuthorization": [
        "AddSafes",
        "AuditUsers"
    ],
    "enableUser": true,
    "changePassOnNextLogon": true,
